Package com.dua3.utility.options

Class OptionBuilder<T>

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.options.AbstractOptionBuilder<T,OptionBuilder<T>>
com.dua3.utility.options.OptionBuilder<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the target object for the option being constructed
public class OptionBuilder<T> extends AbstractOptionBuilder<T,OptionBuilder<T>>
A generic builder class used to define and configure options. This class provides methods to set parameters, mappers, repetitions, default values, and other configurations required to build an option instance.

  • Constructor Details

    • OptionBuilder

      protected OptionBuilder(@Nullable ArgumentsParserBuilder argumentsParserBuilder, String displayName, String description, Class<T> targetType)
      Constructs an instance of OptionBuilder with the provided parameters.
      Parameters:
      argumentsParserBuilder - an optional ArgumentsParserBuilder instance that can be used to parse arguments, or null if no argument parser is required
      displayName - the display name of the option being built
      description - a description or detail for the option being built
      targetType - the class type of the target object for this option

  • Method Details

    • toStringListMapper

      public static Function<Object[],List<String>> toStringListMapper()
      Returns a function that maps an array of objects to a list of strings. The method assumes each element of the provided array is a list of objects. It converts each object in the nested lists to its string representation.
      Returns:
      a function that transforms an object array into a list of strings

    • defaultSupplier

      public OptionBuilder<T> defaultSupplier(Supplier<@Nullable T> defaultSupplier)
      Description copied from class: AbstractOptionBuilder
      Sets the default supplier for the option. The default supplier provides a value when no explicit value is supplied for the option.
      Overrides:
      defaultSupplier in class AbstractOptionBuilder<T,OptionBuilder<T>>
      Parameters:
      defaultSupplier - the supplier function to provide a default value, or null if no default value is needed
      Returns:
      this builder instance
